description.displayText: Dean is a caring, thoughtful, and engaging person around children of all ages! I have worked with Dean for a little over a year, on the same team, as Teaching Assistants. In this time I have seen her manage various K - 8 classrooms with 25+ children, as both an assistant and lead teacher. Dean has also worked closely, one-on-one, with many students as a mentor, and friend. They confide in her and seek her help with issues related to their own personal lives. With all that she does within the school, she is organized, attentive and has created lasting relationships with students of all ages.

Dean has also worked closely, one-on-one, with many students as a mentor, and friend. They confide in her and seek her help with issues related to their own personal lives. description.displayText: Dean and I worked together for several years as counselors at a summer camp for kids ages 7 to 16. They are patient and responsible and they find joy in supporting children to be their own person. Though their time with our campers is often brief, they leave a lasting impression on these children and sometimes forge long term relationships with them as a mentor. I would highly recommend Dean as your child care provider.
